A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
What a poor show from Disney. This film single handedly destroys everything that was built in the force awakens and adds ridiculous force powers that Disney seem to think you can just make up on the spot. Will the jedis be flying in the next film and have 10 arms? 

Good points-
-Mark Hamills acting is top notch
-Some of the shots and angles are visually pleasing
-Oscar Issacs character is played well

Bad points-
-Terrible direction for Luke Skywalkers character
-Further character development was weak
-breaks all the rules and laws of Star Wars
-Rose was a plain and boring character with a terrible story line
-Disney's jokes were just an insult to Star Wars including 'your mum' jokes... really? In Star Wars?
- Reys parents? No comment
